ovdesc.p: Selection of accounts for automatic matching.
Verification of a record runs automatic matching for the account(s) selected on the record.

desc.p: This field allows the user to enter the accounts to be automatically matched. Input may be for either one or more accounts.
Multivalued field - 16 character account number Standard T24 account number format
This field allow the user to automatically match items for all accounts irrespective of whether or not there are values in the ACCOUNT.NUMBER field.
1 character input field Acceptable values - 'Y' or blank NB. If this field is set to Y, this will override the any account numbers entered in the ACCOUNT.NUMBER field
Identifies any additional element which has been defined locally to meet a particular requirement.

As in the majority of T24 Applications, the User is allowed to define in the Automatch file up to 999 Local Elements in addition to the standard fields previously specified. These Local Elements should be defined by the User where deemed necessary according to local practice.

The name(s) of the new element(s), as well as the Format and
Validation Rules:, must be defined in the LOCAL.TABLE, prior to the creation of any Item records.

Up to 35 characters as defined in the Local Table definition for this Local Reference field. Multivalue field. (Optional or Mandatory Input according to definition in LOCAL.TABLE for this Local Reference element)
As defined by the User within the LOCAL.TABLE and LOCAL.REF.TABLE.
Represents the reference number to uniquely identify a particular automatch reference
This may be any reference that is meaningful to the user (i.e. accounts, account groups etc.)
This is a 15 character free format field identifying this automatch item to the user.
Contains details of any overrides applicable to this automatch record.
No Input allowed (Populated by the system when overrides occur)
